verses.verse: וְהַנַּ֧עַר <S%H5288><s%> And the child שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel מְשָׁרֵ֥ת <S%H8334><s%> ministered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before עֵלִ֑י <S%H5941><s%> Eli וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become יָקָר֙ <S%H3368><s%> was precious בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> in those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> those אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else חָז֖וֹן <S%H2377><s%> vision נִפְרָֽץ׃ <S%H6555><s%> [there was] no open ס

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> happened בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass at that time הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> as וְעֵלִ֖י <S%H5941><s%> when Eli שֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> [was] laid down בִּמְקֹמ֑וֹ <S%H4725><s%> in his place [וְעֵינֹו כ] (וְעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> affliction ק) הֵחֵ֣לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> began כֵה֔וֹת <S%H3544><s%> to wax dim לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> he יוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> [that] he could לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <S%H7200><s%> not see

וְנֵ֤ר <S%H5216><s%> And ere the lamp אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God טֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> yet יִכְבֶּ֔ה <S%H3518><s%> went out וּשְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> [was] and Samuel שֹׁכֵ֑ב <S%H7901><s%> was laid down בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> where the ark אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God פ
וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> That the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he answered הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2005><s%> behold

וַיָּ֣רָץ <S%H7323><s%> And he ran אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵלִ֗י <S%H5941><s%> unto Eli וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָרָ֣אתָ <S%H7121><s%> for thou calledst לִּ֔י וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> me And he said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not קָרָ֖אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I called שׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> again שְׁכָ֑ב <S%H7901><s%> not lie down וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> and lay down ס

וַיֹּ֣סֶף <S%H3254><s%> yet again יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD קְרֹ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> yet שְׁמוּאֵל֒ <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵלִ֔י <S%H5941><s%> to Eli וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנְנִ֔י <S%H2005><s%> behold כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָרָ֖אתָ <S%H7121><s%> Here [am] I for thou didst call לִ֑י וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> me And he answered לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not קָרָ֥אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I called בְנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> not my son שׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> again שְׁכָֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> lie down

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֕ל <S%H8050><s%> Now Samuel טֶ֖רֶם <S%H2962><s%> did not yet יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְטֶ֛רֶם <S%H2962><s%> nor יִגָּלֶ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> yet revealed אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> neither was the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֨סֶף <S%H3254><s%> again יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD קְרֹא־ <S%H7121><s%> called שְׁמוּאֵל֮ <S%H8050><s%> Samuel בַּשְּׁלִשִׁית֒ <S%H7992><s%> the third time וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> And he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵלִ֔י <S%H5941><s%> to Eli וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנְנִ֔י <S%H2005><s%> behold כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָרָ֖אתָ <S%H7121><s%> Here [am] I for thou didst call לִ֑י וַיָּ֣בֶן <S%H995><s%> perceived עֵלִ֔י <S%H5941><s%> me And Eli כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD קֹרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> had called לַנָּֽעַר׃ <S%H5288><s%> the child

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said עֵלִ֣י <S%H5941><s%> Therefore Eli לִשְׁמוּאֵל֮ <S%H8050><s%> unto Samuel לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go שְׁכָב֒ <S%H7901><s%> lie down וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> shall be if יִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and it shall be if he call אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> thee that thou shalt say דַּבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> heareth עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> for thy servant וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> So Samuel וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> and lay down בִּמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> in his place

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD וַיִּתְיַצַּ֔ב <S%H3320><s%> and stood וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called כְפַֽעַם־ <S%H6471><s%> as at other times בְּפַ֖עַם <S%H6471><s%> times שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H8050><s%> Samuel שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> Then Samuel דַּבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> heareth עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> for thy servant פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> to Samuel הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> Behold I will do דָבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> a thing בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of everyone שֹׁ֣מְע֔וֹ <S%H8085><s%> of every one that heareth תְּצִלֶּ֖ינָה <S%H6750><s%> it shall tingle שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> at which both אָזְנָֽיו׃ <S%H241><s%> the ears

בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> I אָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> I will perform אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning עֵלִ֔י <S%H5941><s%> against Eli אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> all [things] which I have spoken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> his house הָחֵ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> when I begin וְכַלֵּֽה׃ <S%H3615><s%> I will also make an end

וְהִגַּ֣דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> For I have told ל֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because שֹׁפֵ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> him that I will judge אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> his house עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> for the iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> which he knoweth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מְקַֽלְלִ֤ים <S%H7043><s%> made themselves vile לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> themselves בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> because his sons וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not כִהָ֖ה <S%H3543><s%> and he restrained בָּֽם׃

וְלָכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> And therefore I have sworn לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house עֵלִ֑י <S%H5941><s%> of Eli אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יִתְכַּפֵּ֞ר <S%H3722><s%> shall not be purged עֲוֹ֧ן <S%H5771><s%> that the iniquity בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house עֵלִ֛י <S%H5941><s%> of Eli's בְּזֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> with sacrifice וּבְמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> nor offering עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> lay שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> until the morning וַיִּפְתַּ֖ח <S%H6605><s%> and opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּשְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel יָרֵ֔א <S%H3372><s%> feared מֵהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> to shew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּרְאָ֖ה <S%H4759><s%> the vision אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵלִֽי׃ <S%H5941><s%> Eli

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called עֵלִי֙ <S%H5941><s%> Then Eli אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> my son וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2005><s%> behold

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> What הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> What [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that [the LORD] hath said אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please תְכַחֵ֖ד <S%H3582><s%> unto thee? I pray thee hide מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> so יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> do so לְּךָ֤ אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> [it] not from me God וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> also יוֹסִ֔יף <S%H3254><s%> to thee and more also אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תְּכַחֵ֤ד <S%H3582><s%> if thou hide מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <S%H4480><s%> at דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> [any] thing מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> from me of all the things אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that he said אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> told ל֤וֹ שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> him every whit וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nothing כִחֵ֖ד <S%H3582><s%> and hid מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> and he וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> nothing from him And he said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> It [is] the LORD ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> him good בְּעֵינָ֖ו <S%H5869><s%> what seemeth יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> let him do פ

וַיִּגְדַּ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> grew שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הִפִּ֥יל <S%H5307><s%> fall מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner דְּבָרָ֖יו <S%H1697><s%> was with him and did let none of his words אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> to the ground

וַיֵּ֙דַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> knew כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> And all Israel מִדָּ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> from Dan וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> even to Beersheba כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for נֶאֱמָ֣ן <S%H539><s%> [was] established שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> that Samuel לְנָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> [to be] a prophet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֥סֶף <S%H3254><s%> again יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לְהֵרָאֹ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> appeared בְשִׁלֹ֑ה <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because נִגְלָ֨ה <S%H1540><s%> revealed יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <S%H8050><s%> himself to Samuel בְּשִׁל֖וֹ <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh בִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> by the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ
